content:
Continental Breakfast Buffet: $22

Fresh Seasonal Fruits, Yogurt, Fresh Baked Pastries, Breakfast Deli Meat and Cheese assortment, Juice, Equator Coffee 

 Full Breakfast Buffet  : $28 

Continental plus selection of Hot Items including: Oatmeal, Scrambled Eggs, Roasted Potatoes, Bacon or Chicken Sausage, Daily Sweet Special (Pancakes or French Toast), self serve Espresso Beverages and Fresh Squeezed Orange Juice. 

 

*Menu items subject to change/room service not avaiable
